title: Is it fraud when wife does multiple things to you?
question: Let our new home we built lose for 2600.00 never knew about it her father buys house back with understanding we would by back asap. Her father 88 yo know refinanced took her name off put her father's name sold. I found her father will gift her the house when he dies. 1.2 million dollar home I help build and sank 60 k in. So now going through divorce I find all this out well you want business you can have it. Sold to highest bidder it goes on and on.
answers: Get yourself an attorney and fight for what is yours. Clearly you have been outplayed so far. Don't let it continue to happen by failing to have an attorney represent you in the divorce.
One owner (title on deed) cannot “remove” another owner from the deed. Only the owner can grant the property to anyone else. (Absent fraud.)

Yes. Spouse mat be liable for fraud and breach of fiduciary duties.
Review specifics with FL counsel for guidance..
